shri lanka prajathanthrikasamajawadi janaraja wyawasthawe methek nirwachanaya kara nomathi 'buddha shasanaya' yanna habuddha shasanayata 'pramukhasthanaya di surakshitha kota poshanaya kirima' yanna nirwachanaya kota 1959 nowambar masa lankanduwa wisin prakashayata path karana lada buddha shasana komishanwarthawe athi nirdesha kriyathmaka kirimata awashya nithi regulasi sampadanaya kirimatakatayuthu karana lesa rajayata yojana karannemu.

pesha karmantha kuda karmantha katayuthu palath sabhawe paripalanaya sakas une aandukarathumage anumathiyen.palath karmantha departhamenthuwak sthapitha karala disthrikkawala katayuthu eekabaddha kara.palath karmantha departha menthuwapeshakarma ha kudakarmantha mulasthane bawatapath una.kolambaath ekka katayuthu karmantha adhayaksha waraya magin keruna.mewidiyata sanwidhasnaya wela katayuthu sidda karana kota dawasak hadisi sakachchawakata thrikunamale enna kiyala liyumak aawa.raswima aandukara karyalaye thibune.raswime hitiye karmantha adhyaksha welayudhan pille mahaththayayi madakalapu kudakarmantha adhyaksha sinnathambi nonayi mamayi witharayi.me sakachchawa mulasane aandukarathuma matath madakalapu sahakara adhyakshatath payil dekak dunna.mepayil eke thibune risitpath godak .merisit path gana kathawa aandukasrathuma kiwwa.rajaya ath yanthra peshakarmanthaya diyunu kirimasandaha gath thiranayak anuwa ath yanthra nul sandaha sahanadhara wadasatahanak kriyathmaka kara athi bawath eeyatathe ath yanthra sandaha pawichchi karana nul sandaha 10% mulya sahanayak labadena bawathesandaha nulnishpadanaya karana aayathana ath yanthra redi nishpadakayanta 10%wattamak sahithawanul laba di ema bilpathwala pitapath peshakarma amathyanshayata idiripath kalapasu amathyanshaya ese adu kala wattama nul nishpadana aayathanawalata gewima kara athi bawath aandukarathuma pahadilikala.alathwalata balaya wimadhyagatha wunanisa uthuru nagenahira palathe megewima palathsabhawen karana lesa danwaathi bawath eeanuwa nagenahira palathe ampara madakalapuwa disthrikkawala wiyannanta labadun nulwalata adala risit path sandaha gewim kirimata balana wita gewiyayuthumudala laksha panahak pamana wana bawin megana disthrik sahakara adhyakshawaru dedena samaga sakachchakirimata thiranaya kalabawath eeanuwa mema gewima gana adahas dakwanalesath danwuwa.
